comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "Thomas Coleman du Pont (December 11, 1863 – November 11, 1930) was an American engineer and politician, from Greenville, Delaware. He was President of the of E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company, and a member of the Republican Party who served parts of two terms as United States Senator from Delaware.[1] He was known by his middle name." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/T._Coleman_du_Pont
